attributes.action: Remove Labour Peer Lord Ahmed as a Lord and a member of the Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This person is a killer and is not worth his title or his position. He is now a criminal and therefore should not hold any position in a Government that is running this country. On behalf of the people of this land I deem him unfit for his position and demand his removal.
Or will this be yet another Criminal to join the Labour Ranks, it is no wonder the British Public are losing trust in this party.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
